nav.div: Anacortes School District » News » What's New » Schools remain closed

span.span: , all district schools will remain closed through the end of the 2019-20 school year.

br.span: The district is working on a revised learning plan, in collaboration with the Anacortes Education Association. Our special education team has also worked hard to develop a plan that addresses the needs of students with individual education plans. We will provide further information later this month.
Our high school team is also working on a plan for seniors.
Please continue to check out websites for resources during this closure:
- provides mental health resources, counselor contact info, and social-emotional learning resources.

a.title: Link to Anacortes Reads
a.style: color: rgb(29, 29, 29); text-decoration-line: none; background-color: transparent;

br.span: - In partnership with Anacortes Public Library, this page provides links to e-books, read alouds, and other reading resources.
Thank you for your continued patience and support.
If you have questions, and don't know who to contact, please call (360) 503-1200 or email
